

```
sed -i.bak -e "s/^seeds =./seeds = "$SEEDS"/; s/^persistent_peers =./persistent_peers = "$PEERS"/" $HOME/.rebusd/config/config.toml
```

```
systemctl restart rebusd && journalctl -u rebusd -f -o cat
```
